entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal] Add missing `SymbolDisplayFormat.Add/Remove/With` methods for `DelegateStyle`, `ExtensionMethodStyle`, `PropertyStyle` and `TypeQualificationStyle` #70777

Closed

  • String interpolation doesn't allow bracket escapes in format string #70779
  • Very helpful ML-based suggestion :) #70775
  • IntelliSense and syntax highlight not working at all for function pointer callconv-s #59052
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue with raw-string-indentation tag not being drawn if end of string is offscreen #70778
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Syntax classification improvement #70772
    Area-IDE, untriaged
